Block.Text: {C1}Le Pokémon peut endormir les ennemis proches.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon peut endormir les ennemis proches pour longtemps.{End}
{C1}Réduit l'Attaque des ennemis proches.{End}
{C1}Réduit la vitesse des ennemis proches.{End}
{C1}Réduit la précision des ennemis proches.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Énergie des alliés proches.{End}
{C1}Augumente la Defense des alliés proches.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon est capable de collecter plus d'or.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon est capable de collecter plus d'or considérablement.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon explose lors de l'évanouissements, infligeant des dégâts sur les Pokémon à proximité.{End}
{C1}Apparaît déguisé en un Pokémon allié.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon dispose de plusieurs capacités différentes et peuvent infliger des dégâts aux Pokémon de tous les types.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon bénéficie de compétences Guerrier alliés, où qu'ils soient.{End}
{C1}Les ennemis adjacentes au Pokémon ne peuvent plus bouger.{End}
{C1}Permet à un Pokémon d'abattre les arbres avec leur attaques.{End}
{C1}Permet à un Pokémon de briser les rochers avec leur attaques.{End}
{C1}Augumente la Portée quand il y a aucun autre Pokémon délai de trois carrés.{End}
{C1}Augumente la Portée.{End}
{C1}Forces les ennemis frappés pour échanger leurs places avec les ennemis adjacents.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque quand le Pokémon est au-dessus de son objectif.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque quand le Pokémon est au-dessous de son objectif.{End}
{C1}Renforce l'efficacité des attaques de Type-Feu des alliés adjacents.{End}
{C1}Renforce l'efficacité des attaques de Type-Eau des alliés adjacents.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque proportionnellement à la distance parcourue.{End}
{C1}Améliore les compétences à chaque fois que le Pokémon bat un ennemi.{End}
{C1}Réduit la portée des ennemis touchés.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon peut agir comme un appât, attirant les attaques ennemies.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon peut agir comme un appât, protégeant les alliés des mouvements ennemis.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon peut se déplacer librement à travers les carrés qui contiennent des alliés.{End}
{C1}Le Pokémon peut restaurer une compétence Guerrier déjà utilisé quand leur armée se bat.{End}
{C1}Améliore les compétences quand le Pokémon est entouré par des ennemis.{End}
{C1}Les ennemis adjacent peuvent se déplacer qu'un seul carreau à la fois.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur ne fait que flopper et trempper pour rien...{End}
{C1}L'objectif est physiquement battu avec une longue queue ou une patte de devant, etc.{End}
{C1}Une attaque physique dans laquelle l'utilisateur charge et claque vers la cible avec son corps tout entier.{End}
{C1}L'objectif est giflé à plusieurs reprises, en avant et en arrière, deux à cinq fois d'affilée.{End}
{C1}L'objectif est ratissé avec des griffes acérées ou faux deux à cinq fois en succession rapide.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur se précipite vers la cible à une vitesse qui le rend presque invisible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tire sa tête et attaque en chargeant directement sur la cible. Ça peut également fléchir la cible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attaque en frappant la cible avec sa queue dure. Ça frappe le Pokémon deux à cinq fois de suite.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tombe sur la cible avec tout le poids de son corps. Ça peut également laisser la cible paralysée.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur mord dur sur la cible avec ses crocs pointus. Ça peut également fléchir la cible.{End}
{C1}La cible est attaquée avec un The target is attacked with a slash de griffes, etc. Ça a un haut taux de coup-critique.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur lâche un cri écho horrible avec le pouvoir d'infliger des dégâts.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur lâche des coup de lumière innombrables.{End}
{C1}La cible est attaquée avec des petites flammes. Ça peut également brûler la cible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur mord avec des crocs enflammés. Ça peut également fléchir ou brûler la cible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur se drape dans le feu et charge vers la cible. Ça peut également brûler la cible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attaque la cible avec un flamme éclatante.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur claque sa cible avec son corps enflammé.{End}
{C1}La cible se retrouve piégé dans un tourbillon de feu féroce qui frappe quatre à cinq fois.{End}
{C1}La cible est roussi avec rafale de feu intense. Ça peut également brûler la cible.{End}
{C1}Drapé de flammes, l'utilisateur dance et bat ses ailes. Ça peut également augumenter l'Attaque de l'utilisateur.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. Ça peut également brûler la cible.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding an item, the item becomes burnt up and unusable.{End}
{C1}A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the target. It may also lower the target's Speed.{End}
{C1}The enemy is blasted with a forceful shot of water.{End}
{C1}A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. It may also lower the target's Speed.{End}
{C1}If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.{End}
{C1}A pulse of water is ejected at the target, confusing them.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.{End}
{C1}La cible is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.{End}
{C1}Shock the target, with a potential to inflict paralysis.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.{End}
{C1}Charge the target while shrouded in electricity, with a potential to inflict paralysis. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.{End}
{C1}A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.{End}
{C1}After making its attack, the user will switch places with another Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Strike the target with an enormous lightning bolt. It may also cause paralysis.{End}
{C1}Charge the target while shrouded in electricity, with a potential to inflict paralysis. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur charges at its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.{End}
{C1}A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.{End}
{C1}The enemy is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.{End}
{C1}A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.{End}
{C1}La cible is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}A sharp-edged leaf is launched to slash at the target. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}Petals are scattered two to three times to attack the target. The user is temporarily immobilized.{End}
{C1}A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The move's recoil lowers the user's Attack.{End}
{C1}Create a small blizzard that may also freeze the target.{End}
{C1}Blow an icy gale toward the target. May also reduce the target's Range.{End}
{C1}La cible is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur continually rolls into the target several times. It becomes stronger each time it hits.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.{End}
{C1}This attack inflicts great damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}Attack with tremendous force. The user's Attack and Defense will decrease as a result.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.{End}
{C1}Sting the enemy with a poisoned needle. May poison the target.{End}
{C1}An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail attack may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur bites the enemy with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.{End}
{C1}A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}La cible is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur slaps dirt at the target, dealing damage and lowering the opponent's accuracy.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed is reduced.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur throws a blob of mud at the target, which may lower accuracy.{End}
{C1}The attacker digs underground in the first turn then pops up in the next turn to attack.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Defense.{End}
{C1}La cible is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur takes the target into the sky then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}La cible is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.{End}
{C1}Teleport to another square.{End}
{C1}Emit a beam of mysterious light in the enemy's direction. It may leave the target confused.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur launches a strong psychokinetic attack, lowering their enemy's Defense.{End}
{C1}A hunk of psychic energy attacks the target 2 turns after this move is used.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur bites the target. If the target is holding an item, the user eats it and gains its effect.{End}
{C1}La cible is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.{End}
{C1}The enemy is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with rocks thrown forcefully two to five times in a row.{End}
{C1}Bombard the enemy with rocks. It may also reduce the target's Range.{End}
{C1}Send large rocks crashing into the enemy. It may also cause the target to flinch.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur stabs the target with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur launches a huge boulder at the enemy to attack. Cannot be used 2 turns in a row.{End}
{C1}Aggressively lick the enemy. It may also cause the target to flinch.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur extends its shadow and attacks the enemy from behind.{End}
{C1}Attack the enemy with a ball of dark shadows, lowering the enemy's Defense.{End}
{C1}This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur knocks away the target, causing it to be switched out for a different Pokémon.{End}
{C1}La cible is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur blasts the enemy with power that distorts even time. It cannot be used 2 turns in a row.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur rampages and attacks two to three times. The user is temporarily immobilized.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur approaches the target disarmingly then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.{End}
{C1}If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.{End}
{C1}La cible is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.{End}
{C1}Slash the target while its attention is diverted. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy.{End}
{C1}Scratch the enemy with steel claws. It may also increase the user's Attack.{End}
{C1}Strike the enemy with a hard head. It may also cause the target to flinch.{End}
{C1}Beat the enemy with a hardened tail. It may also lower the target's Attack.{End}
{C1}La cible is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets.{End}
{C1}L'utilisateur gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Defense.{End}
{C1}Unleash a powerful kick to knock the enemy off their feet.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Raises Defense (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Significantly increases Range.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Restores HP of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Significantly raises Attack.{End}
{C1}Raises Defense of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}All moves are guaranteed to hit.{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Enables Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places.{End}
{C1}Increases probability of inflicting status ailments on enemies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Makes enemies flinch (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range and makes enemies flinch.{End}
{C1}Restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Restores HP. Cannot move for 3 turns.{End}
{C1}Slowly restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Cures status ailments of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are poisoned or paralyzed.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are confused or sleeping.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are burned or frozen.{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy.{End}
{C1}Significantly increases Range and Attack.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque and allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Makes enemies flinch and allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Cures status ailments and restores HP for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy. Increases Energy (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy. Increases Energy and Attack (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy and increases chance of critical hits for Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Increases Range and Attack for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and increases Speed for all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Speed and ensures all moves hit (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque but lowers Defense of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Enables Warrior's Pokémon to avoid all enemy moves.{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Defense of all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Range of all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies―at a cost...{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and increases Energy for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Increases effectiveness of moves against Pokémon with male Warrior partners (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range, makes enemies flinch, and allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Dramatically improves Defense (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and status ailments for all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Disables all enemy Warrior Skills.{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Range of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}All allies' moves will have a chance to confuse the enemy.{End}
{C1}Increases Range, allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places, and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves Speed, allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places, and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases chance of critical hits and allows the Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque in proportion to the number of female Warriors on the battlefield.{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque and restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Raises Defense and restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Improves Speed and makes enemies flinch.{End}
{C1}Raises Energy and Attack of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}All allies' moves will be successful (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque and Defense (for 4 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range, and attacks will always be successful (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Augumente l'Attaque and makes enemies flinch (for 4 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Speed, and attacks will always be successful (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Raises Defense and blocks status ailments (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range and Attack. Reduces HP to 1.{End}
{C1}Restores 20 HP.{End}
{C1}Restores 50 HP.{End}
{C1}Restores 200 HP.{End}
{C1}Fully restores HP.{End}
{C1}Restores HP and cures status ailments.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on grass (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in water (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in magma (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in a poison bog (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on rock (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on snow or ice (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Cures paralysis.{End}
{C1}Cures sleep.{End}
{C1}Cures poisoning.{End}
{C1}Cures burning.{End}
{C1}Cures freezing.{End}
{C1}Cures all status ailments.{End}
{C1}Prevents paralysis (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents sleep (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents poisoning (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents burning (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents freezing (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents any status ailments (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Slightly increases Energy.{End}
{C1}Increases Energy.{End}
{C1}Significantly increases Energy.{End}
{C1}Increases Energy to maximum level.{End}
{C1}Slightly increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 4 turns).{End}
{C1}Significantly increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 5 turns).{End}
{C1}Guarantees a critical hit on the next attack.{End}
{C1}Increases Range by one square (for 3 turns).{End}
